mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACE ( PLACE_NUM, PLACE_LNG, PLACE_ADDR, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_TYPE, PLACE_LAT, PLACE_TEL, PLACE_MENU ) VALUES ( PLACE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{lng}, #{addr}, #{name}, #{type}, #{lat}, #{tel}, #{menu} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT P.*, EXTRACT (MONTH FROM LP.LIKEPLACE_DATE) AS MONTH, (SELECT COUNT(LIKEPLACE_MEM) CNT FROM LIKEPLACE LP WHERE LP.LIKEPLACE_PLACE = P.PLACE_NUM) AS CNT FROM PLACE P, LIKEPLACE LP WHERE P.PLACE_NUM = LP.LIKEPLACE_PLACE) WHERE MONTH = #{PLACE_MONTH} ORDER BY CNT DESC
